data.name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Hunter Voice: Kagero the Merchant
data.detailed_description:
Change up your hunter's sound with this special voice option!

Kagero is a popular figure around the village known for his mysterious face-covering cloth. With this voice pack, your hunter can take on his peaceful tones.

After purchasing, select Change Appearance in the Item Box to apply to your hunter.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.
